explains: v. 嘀咕，嘟囔；（私下）抱怨，发牢骚
n. 嘀咕，嘟囔；私下抱怨
【名】 （Mutter）（英）马特，（法）米泰，（德、匈、西）穆特（人名）

sentences.en: "Excuse me," I mutter, "I have to get this sham over with."
sentences.cn: “对不起。”我喃喃地说，“我得把这个假动作做完。”

sentences.en: John would rub his eyes and mutter, "It is true, we did fly."
sentences.cn: 约翰揉了揉眼睛，喃喃自语道：“这是真的，我们真的飞了。”

sentences.en: The old man, still pacing back and forth, ceased to speak aloud, and began to mutter.
sentences.cn: 老人仍在来回踱步，不再大声说话，开始喃喃自语起来。
